thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 12 of 523
thread.title: Bill

author: Bill
title: Bill
text: I finally talked my 17yr. old daughter into buying a prom dress online. I tried last year and she would not do it and the dress she finally got cost me over $400.00. This year, I finally talked her into looking online and we ordered from PromGirl. The dress came in within two days and my daughter was 100% pleased with the dress and this is not easy to do. Her dress is beautiful and cost half as much as I paid for a dress at a local dress shop last year. That make two happy customers from one order!
